books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel set in the 1920s about the American dream, wealth, and love.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the Deep South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that also critiques societal norms of the 19th century.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about teenage angst and rebellion.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: A seafaring narrative about obsession and revenge.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy adventure about a hobbit's journey to reclaim treasure.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical story about following one's dreams.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A sprawling narrative about history, love, and war.

books.title: The Road
books.author: Cormac McCarthy
books.description: A post-apocalyptic tale about survival and father-son bonding.
